title: MCP Registry · GitHub
description: A faster, safer way to build with AI: the GitHub MCP Registry centralizes MCP servers for effortless discovery, integration, and open collaboration.
author: Unknown

h1: Search code, repositories, users, issues, pull requests...
Connect models to the real world
h2: Use saved searches to filter your results more quickly

text_content: Connect models to the real world Servers and tools from the community that connect models to files, APIs, databases, and more. Search MCP Registry Search All MCP servers 39 Markitdown Install Convert various file formats (PDF, Word, Excel, images, audio) to Markdown. Context7 Install Get up-to-date, version-specific documentation and code examples from any library or framework. GitHub Install Official GitHub MCP Server that connects AI tools directly to GitHub's platform. Enables AI agents to read repositories, manage issues and PRs, analyze code, and automate workflows through natural language interactions. Playwright Install Automate web browsers using accessibility trees for testing and data extraction. Serena Install Semantic code retrieval & editing tools for coding agents. Firecrawl Install Extract web data with Firecrawl Notion Install Official MCP server for Notion API Unity Install Control the Unity Editor from MCP clients via a Unity bridge + local Python server. Azure Install The Azure MCP Server, bringing the power of Azure to your agents. Stripe Install Interact with Stripe API Terraform Install Seamlessly integrate with Terraform ecosystem, enabling advanced automation and interaction capabilities for Infrastructure as Code (IaC) development powered by Terraform Microsoft Learn Install Enables clients like GitHub Copilot and other AI agents to bring trusted and up-to-date information directly from Microsoft's official documentation. Azure DevOps Install Interact with Azure DevOps services like repositories, work items, builds, releases, test plans, and code search. Nuxt Install MCP server helping models understand your Vite/Nuxt app. Mongodb Install A Model Context Protocol server to connect to MongoDB databases and MongoDB Atlas Clusters. Elasticsearch Install MCP server for connecting to Elasticsearch data and indices. Supports search queries, mappings, ES|QL, and shard information through natural language interactions. Neon Install MCP server for interacting with Neon Management API and databases Chroma Install Provides data retrieval capabilities powered by Chroma, enabling AI models to create collections over generated data and user inputs, and retrieve that data using vector search, full text search, metadata filtering, and more. Sentry Install Retrieve and analyze application errors and performance issues from Sentry projects. Monday.com Install Enable AI agents to work reliably - giving them secure access to structured data, tools to take action, and the context needed to make smart decisions. Azure AI Foundry Install An experimental MCP server implementation for Azure AI Foundry that exposes unified tools for models, knowledge, evaluation and deployment. Imagesorcery Install Local image processing with computer vision capabilities including object detection, OCR, image editing, and transformations. Dynatrace Install Manage and interact with the Dynatrace Platform for real-time observability and monitoring. Logfire Install Provides access to OpenTelemetry traces and metrics through Logfire. Azure Kubernetes Service Install Interact with Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) from MCP clients. Hugging Face Install Access Hugging Face models, datasets, Spaces, papers, collections via MCP. Webflow Install Enable AI agents to interact with Webflow APIs. Fabric Real-Time Intelligence Install Query Eventhouse/ADX with KQL and manage Eventstreams. Box Install Securely connect AI agents to your enterprise content in Box Codacy Install MCP Server for the Codacy API, enabling access to repositories, files, quality, coverage, security and more. Clarity Install Fetch Clarity analytics via MCP clients. DeepWiki Install Devin-generated docs for any public repo Postman Install Postman's MCP server connects AI agents, assistants, and chatbots directly to your APIs on Postman. Use natural language to prompt AI to automate work across your Postman collections, environments, workspaces, and more. Launchdarkly Install Official LaunchDarkly MCP Server for feature flag management and experimentation. Enables AI agents to interact with LaunchDarkly APIs for managing feature flags, AI configs, targeting rules, and gradual rollouts across multiple environments. Atlassian Install Remote MCP Server that securely connects Jira and Confluence with your LLM, IDE, or agent platform of choice. Figma Dev Mode Install Expose design context to MCP clients. JFrog Install JFrog MCP Server: providing your agents with direct access to JFrog Platform services. Dev Box Install This server enables natural language interactions for developer-focused operations like managing Dev Boxes, configurations, and pools. Zapier Install Zapier MCP is a remote MCP server that gives your AI direct access to 8,000+ apps and 30,000+ actions—no complex API integrations required.
